pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, January 14, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador

8:30 a.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of St. John’s, Danny Breen.

Closed to media.

9:30 a.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Newfoundland and Labrador, Dwight Ball.

Office of the Premier
Confederation Building, East Block

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.
